_comment_note: NOTE: All fields starting with '_comment_' are just explanatory notes and not actual configuration settings
_comment_intro: BOT CONFIGURATION - Please read the instructions below carefully before editing
_comment_token: Discord authentication token - Get it from https://discord.com/developers/applications
_comment_prefix: Prefix for traditional bot commands (does not affect slash commands)
_comment_owner: List of user IDs with bot owner permissions (integer numbers)
_comment_guild: Server specific mode - 'true' to restrict the bot to a specific server, 'false' for global
_comment_guild_id: Server ID if guild_only is true (can be number or string)
_comment_rsn: RSNChat API key - Get it from https://rsnlabs.com/api/register
_comment_instructions: HOW TO CONFIGURE CHANNELS: Use the /setup command to add, update, or remove channels for AI chat usage
_comment_footer: IMPORTANT: Entries starting with '_comment_' are informational only. The actual configuration settings are the ones without this prefix.
